mapper.insert: insert into AuthCode (AcdSn, UsrSn, AcdName, AcdID, CallFromClient, CallFromBrowser, RestrictUrl, DataUseType) values (#{acdsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callfromclient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callfrombrowser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{restricturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datausetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update AuthCode set UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AcdName = #{acdname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AcdID = #{acdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CallFromClient = #{callfromclient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CallFromBrowser = #{callfrombrowser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RestrictUrl = #{restricturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DataUseType = #{datausetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where AcdSn = #{acdsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select AcdSn, UsrSn, AcdName, AcdID, CallFromClient, CallFromBrowser, RestrictUrl, DataUseType from AuthCode where AcdSn = #{acdsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select AcdSn, UsrSn, AcdName, AcdID, CallFromClient, CallFromBrowser, RestrictUrl, DataUseType from AuthCode
